Key Match Events: Raphael Onyedika scored Nigeria's only goal of the game from outside the box in the 27th minute.
Benin scored two goals before halftime, with Junior Olaitan scoring after a defensive mix-up, and Steve Mounié finding space in the Nigeria box to poke past Stanley Nwabali.
Post-Match Reflections: The Super Eagles suffered an embarrassing defeat to Benin in the FIFA 2026 World Cup qualifier at the Félix Houphouët-Boigny Stadium in Abidjan.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Nigeria dominated for long spells in the second half but could not find an equaliser.
The match was played at the Félix Houphouët-Boigny Stadium in Abidjan.
Others: Stanley Nwabali showed composure when called upon but will be disappointed he did not keep a clean sheet against Benin.
Wilfred Ndidi was not at his best as Benin held sway for long periods in the game.
